# Macht

𓌂 𓅓 𓏏 𓏥 Macht моц moc mace мощ mošt (power, force )

𓏠 𓈖 𓐍 𓍊 𓏛 | potent | ⇔ mannigfaltig mächtig

𓊠 𓂝 𓀁 𓄣 𓏤 | capable, skilled | ?

𓅜 𐌰𐌷𐌰 aḫa spirit, mind, reason

𓅜 𐌰𐌷𐌼𐌰 ahma Atem spirit (breath 𓅡) ma.achat Macht

𓅜 𓐍 𓏛 ἀρχή arkhḗ …archy 𐀀-𐀐-𐀄 a-ke-u (authority, power 𓅢) κρατία kratía

𓌂 ⇔ Machete

⇔ most maximal ?

𓈎 𓈖 𓀜 | (adj. and v.) powerful (of speech), stout (of heart), active, conquer, amount (to), be profuse |
